contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary}} '''Hick''' may refer to: ==Surname== *[[Benjamin Hick]], (1790-1842), a mechanical engineer *[[Graeme Hick]], (born 1966), an English cricketer *[[John Hick]], (1922-2012), a philosopher of religion and theologian *[[Pentland Hick]] (born 1919), a British entrepreneur, author, and publisher *[[W. E. Hick]], (1912-1974), a British psychologist ==Nickname== *[[Hick Cady]], (1886-1946), a baseball player *[[Hick Carpenter]], (1855-1937), a baseball player ==See also== *[[Hicks (disambiguation)]] *[[Hillbilly]] *[[Hicks (surname)]] *[[Yokel]], as a derogatory stereotype *[[Hick (film)|''Hick'' (film)]], directed by Derick Martini {{disambig}}
